about_the_game:
Liquid Abyss is a fantastical adventure game set in a mysterious underwater aquarium. The protagonist, Ellie, finds herself lost in this submerged world and discovers that her body has transformed into a jelly-like form. She has almost no memory of who she is or why she is there.

In the abyssal depths of this world, strange jellyfish and peculiar inhabitants begin to speak to Ellie. At times, they may even become threats.

Your first task is to help Ellie recover her memories.
To do so, you will need to perform several actions:

  • Listen
    Gather hints from the inhabitants of this world.

  • Respond
    Choose from options presented by the inhabitants.

  • Explore
    Search the submerged aquarium to find a way to escape.

By repeating these actions, the story will gradually unfold.
There may also be additional actions available to you.

When you finally uncover the truth behind why Ellie has become jelly-like, all the mysteries will come to light.

However, Ellie may not truly desire to return to the world she came from.
Even so, if you choose to guide her back, it might just be the first step toward a new beginning for her.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-8500 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630
  • Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio

short_description: An endless abyss... Is salvation waiting at its end? Ellie awakens in a submerged world resembling an aquarium. Seeing her reflection, she finds her body has turned to jelly. With no memory of how she got here, glowing jellyfish drift around her. Can she find salvation—or be consumed by the abyss?
